Install
=======

Create environment
------------------

Create a virtual environment directly (recommend anaconda)

.. code-block:: bash

    conda create -n neuralkg python=3.8
    conda activate neuralkg

Install from source
-------------------

.. code-block:: bash

    git clone git@github.com:zjukg/NeuralKG.git
    cd NeuralKG
    python setup.py install

Install by pypi
---------------

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install neuralkg
